TopicTitle: Camera stays near vehicle when dragged along the ground

Articles.Content:
OS: Windows 10
CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 5600G
GPU: PALIT GeForce GTX 1660

Okay this one's a little tricky to explain. So the intended behaviour is that when I move my camera along the ground toward the centre of the camera, it should zoom in on that point, and when I move it out, it should move out along the ground until it reaches the distance from the vessel where my camera was originally, and orbits around the vehicle normally.
However, when I do so, the camera gets stuck near to the vessel and orbits that centre without zooming out. So the camera is now closer to the vessel, and I have to zoom out to get back to where I was originally. I can't reall who it off in photos, since it's a camera oddity, and this happened on the Mun with a landed craft.
